value.string: *************************This Bot will create a output file for all the respective supervisor email id from the Supervisor template file and then send a mail to that particular supervisor email address*********************************
**************************Fetch the Supervisor Name and Supervisor Email  from the parent Bot**********************
********************************Generate the Output for the respective supervisor email address*************************************
******************************Send mail to respective supervisor name with  the attaches output file in case if the email address is valid*******************************
**************************If the supervsor email id is valid then prepare the report and send the success mail else send the Exception email**********************************
****************************If input data matches with supervisor email then skip the row else delete the entire row******************************
**************************If the document is created successfully then send the email else send the exception email******************************************
*******************************If send email command fails then send invalid email********************************
*******************************If there are any Unexpected error please log it in log file*****************************
You chose to mark the bot as 'Failed' in case of any encountered errors.
